name: Fish Stock
keywords: dry white wine, fish, side dish
recipeIngredient: Bones and head from 1 flounder, sole or other nonoily fish, gills removed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a large pot over high heat and bring to a boil. (If you are making one of the recipes that calls for shrimp, reserve the shells and add them to the stock for extra flavor.) Reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Strain the stock and set aside until ready to use.
